input.sentences: our neighbor showed us around last week .
her brother was a nut but he loved nice cars .
they had really high priced equipment on board .
i did n't know they needed a team to drive the car .
output.sentences: The gentleman in the hat was planning to have a good day touring the space center.
His lady friend toured the space center museum  and got to sit inside the capsule.
They were shown a number of interesting military items.
The man giving the briefing showed them the office.
They were then shown to where the workers monitored the equipment.
